Question 5 
 
On a planer field, you travelled 3 units east from a point 
O
. Next you travelled 4 units south to arrive 
at point 
P
 . Then you travelled from 
P
  in north-east direction such that you arrive at a point that is 6 
units east of point 
O
. Next, you travelled in the NW direction, so that you arrive at point 
Q
  that is 8
units north of point 
P
 . The distance of point 
Q
  to point 
O
, in same units, should be________.
(A) 6 
 
(B) 4 
(C) 5 
(D) 3 
 
C 
Sol.

Question 6 
 
(i) Arun and Aparna are here  
 
(ii) Arun and Aparna is here 
 
(iii) Arun’s families is here 
 
(iv) Arun’s family is here 
 
Which of the above sentences are grammatically 
CORRECT
?
(A) 1 and 2 
 
(B) 1 and 4 
(C) 2 and 4 
(D) 3 and 4
 
B
